cast.name: 门萨·贝迪亚科 Mensah Bediako

writer.name: 威廉·莎士比亚 William Shakespeare

this_title: Royal Shakespeare Company: Much Ado About Nothing
trans_title: 无事生非 RSC（英国皇家莎士比亚剧团2022版）
introduction: In an imagined futuristic world, two very different couples fall in love - but who is really pulling the strings? With dastardly plots, hilarious slapstick and some of Shakespeare's wittiest dialogue, this story of matchmaking and manipulation is the perfect way to celebrate the joy of live theatre.
chinese_title: 无事生非 RSC（英国皇家莎士比亚剧团2022版）
foreign_title: Royal Shakespeare Company: Much Ado About Nothing
